thread.title: Sam Falin

author: Sam Falin
title: Sam Falin
text: On a recent order several items were out of stock and a credit memo was issued. I tried to use the credit memo on line and could not. I called about the situation and they could not apply the credit memo either. After talking to cust. service reps I was able to get the matter resolved in a timely matter. Oldies has a tremendous selection of titles and some great cut-out prices. At these prices ,items sell out quickly, so some out of stock issues will occur. These issues are resolved in a timely manner and they are looking out for the buyers best interest. Repeat business is the goal of all businesses and they have mine.
